name: Fall in line
description:
Autobattler created for LDJam 48 "Deeper and Deeper"

Instructions

Use your limited controls to face the dangers

  • Swap positions: Make sure the right unit is in the right position.
  • Passives: Passives charges over time, make good use of them
Controls
  • Left Mouse button on arrows to swap position
  • R = Retry
  • Esc = Quit
Warrior
  • Uses energy to reduce damage taken
  • Strong AOE ranged attack
Rogue
  • Unleashes 5 melee attacks when full energy
  • Weak without energy
Mage
  • Can fully avoid damage when full energy
  • Powerful melee AOE
